features.name: Authentication
features.description: Handles user login via Toss App integration and Firebase Custom Tokens, with anonymous fallback. Includes mock support for local dev.

features.name: Receipt Management
features.description: Allows adding, viewing, editing, and deleting emotion receipts. Includes daily limit logic and input validation.

features.name: Statistics Dashboard
features.description: Visualizes emotion data with a thermometer (MoodThermometer) and calendar view. Shows total amount and emotion counts.

features.name: Image Capture
features.description: Captures the dashboard as an image for sharing or saving, utilizing html2canvas.
